moduleMetadataJson.name: DNS and DNSSEC Fuzzer
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will connect to a DNS server and perform DNS and
        DNSSEC protocol-level fuzzing. Note that this module may inadvertently
        crash the target server.
author: pello <fropert@packetfault.org>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: VERBOSE
options.description: Enable detailed status messages

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: RPORT
options.description: The target port

options.name: CPORT
options.description: The local client port

options.name: CHOST
options.description: The local client address

options.name: SSL
options.description: Negotiate SSL/TLS for outgoing connections

options.name: SSLVersion
options.description: Specify the version of SSL/TLS to be used (Auto, TLS and SSL23 are auto-negotiate) (Accepted: Auto, TLS, SSL23, SSL3, TLS1, TLS1.1, TLS1.2)

options.name: SSLVerifyMode
options.description: SSL verification method (Accepted: CLIENT_ONCE, FAIL_IF_NO_PEER_CERT, NONE, PEER)

options.name: SSLCipher
options.description: String for SSL cipher - "DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA" or "ADH"

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::max_send_size
options.description: Maxiumum tcp segment size.  (0 = disable)

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: FuzzTracer
options.description: Sets the magic string to embed into fuzzer string inputs

options.name: FuzzChar
options.description: Sets the character to use for generating long strings

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: STARTSIZE
options.description: Fuzzing string startsize.

options.name: ENDSIZE
options.description: Max Fuzzing string size. (L2 Frame size)

options.name: STEPSIZE
options.description: Increment fuzzing string each attempt.

options.name: ERRORHDR
options.description: Introduces byte error in the DNS header.

options.name: CYCLIC
options.description: Use Cyclic pattern instead of A's (fuzzing payload).

options.name: ITERATIONS
options.description: Number of iterations to run by test case

options.name: DOMAIN
options.description: Force DNS zone domain name.

options.name: IMPORTENUM
options.description: Import dns_enum database output and automatically use existing RR.

options.name: METHOD
options.description: Underlayer protocol to use (Accepted: UDP, TCP, AUTO)

options.name: DNSSEC
options.description: Add DNSsec to each question (UDP payload size, EDNS0, ...)

options.name: TRAILINGNUL
options.description: NUL byte terminate DNS names

options.name: RAWPADDING
options.description: Generate totally random data from STARTSIZE to ENDSIZE

options.name: OPCODE
options.description: Comma separated list of opcodes to fuzz. Leave empty to fuzz all fields.

options.name: CLASS
options.description: Comma separated list of classes to fuzz. Leave empty to fuzz all fields.

options.name: RR
options.description: Comma separated list of requests to fuzz. Leave empty to fuzz all fields.
